section.name: Prepare Maven 2 for PHP for Maven
section.p: First download Maven and follow the installation instructions. After that go to the settings.xml (~/.m2 on Unix/Mac OS X and C:\Documents and Settings\username\.m2 on Windows) and add the PHP for Maven repository. If there is no settings.xml create the settings.xml file.
The last point is that your php.exe and the doxygen.exe must be part of the system path.
